column4: but, I should get at least one windows box showing up, there are 6 on the network
one of the ubuntu boxes is 12.04, the other is 10.10
the idea that an ubuntu software error would affect both machines seems impossible
hrrm, I thought *.10 were the LTS..
I see, guess I need to just change that machine to 12.04
and i'm betting there is no upgrade path to do such a thing, heh
is there any easy way to go from a .10 install to a .04?
look above at the ubotto comment on eol.
yeah, the EOL upgrade link stops at 9.10
dammit, stop pointing out my flawed statements! :)
what should I do with 10.10, I can erase it, but i've made multiple edits
Try reading this https://help.ubuntu.com/community/EOLUpgrades  the upgrade will have to be a eol upgrade TheLordOfTime
